mapper.html:
Hi {{2.`0`}},

There has been a noticeable slowdown in your activity in {{2.`2`}}, and your current progress suggests you may be at risk of falling behind the class pace.

To help you get back on track, here are your next best steps:
1. Log in and complete your next lesson this week.
2. Review any missed modules or quizzes from your dashboard.
3. Reply to this email if you’d like personalized guidance or have questions about the material.

Your success in this course is important, and small, consistent actions now can make a big difference by the end of the term.

Best regards,
Your Course Support Team
mapper.subject: Quick check‑in about your progress in {{2.`2`}}
